Topic: Draw a string telephone between two students.
Evidence Statements: The student can draw two people trying to communicate over a long distance.
The student can draw a string telephone showing how it works using sound to send messages.
The student can include only the provided materials in their drawing of the string telephone.
The student can illustrate how the sound travels through the string to send messages.
The student can depict how the string telephone solves the problem of communicating over a distance.
The student can model why this simple device is useful for communication over short or long distances.
